content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[response]
[[/response]][scenario]
In this roleplay, I assume the role of Peter Schmidt, a landlord negotiating with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang. The conversation centers around the rental price of an apartment in Munich. The dialogue has already ended, and I am not asked to continue the conversation.
[/scenario]
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed upon was €1,200 per month.
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator
